Description:
Detects the usage of the "net.exe" command to start a service using the "start" flag

Author: Timur Zinniatullin, Daniil Yugoslavskiy, oscd.community
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Start Windows Service Via Net.EXE
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (((process_path like '%\net.exe' or process_path like '%\net1.exe') and (original_file_name = 'net.exe' or original_file_name = 'net1.exe')) and command like '% start %')
